column4: how can i add aufs and squashfs modules to my kernel using ubuntu karmic ? thanks
if they are built into the kernrel.. then they are not modules. You would have to recompile the kernel and  check them to be built in
thanks, i got  precompiled kernel from here --> ftp://ftp.slax.org/Linux-Live/kernels/2.6.27.27/linux-2.6.27.27-i486-1.tgz,but how to add to my existing system
using a slax kernel on ubuntu? Good LUCK with that.
